Action.author: rickr
Action.body: Working as designed. You should no long create Eventhubs if you are working with a Fabric server v1.1 or later. The prefered method is to use just the Peer eventing service. Be advised that you can still see duplicate blocks if there are more than one Peer with Peer eventing services created. You'll get one each and each has a means to distinguish which peer was the source.
